example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 讲求) (NP-OBJ (NN 速效)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 台湾人))) (VP (PP-TMP (P 在) (LCP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 桧木林)) (VP (VV 伐除))) (LC 後))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 通常)) (ADVP (AD 都)) (VP (VV 栽种) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (QP-ADV (CD 二十) (CLP (M 年))) (ADVP (AD 即)) (VP (VV 可) (VP (VV 砍伐))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 柳杉))))))
